documentation.text: @notice Converts dust tokens into earned tokens, which will be reinvested on the next earn()
@notice Pause contract
@notice Unpause contract

@notice Set governor address
 @param _govAddress The new gov address

@notice Set onlyGov property
 @param _onlyGov whether onlyGov should be enforced
@notice Set the address of the periphery/router contract (Pancakeswap/Apeswap/etc.)

@notice Set the burn address (for removing tokens out of existence)
 @param _burnAddress the burn address

@notice set the address of the contract to send controller fees to
 @param _rewardsAddress the address of the Rewards contract
@notice Converts dust tokens into earned tokens, which will be reinvested on the next earn()
@notice Pause contract
@notice Unpause contract

@notice Set governor address
 @param _govAddress The new gov address

@notice Set onlyGov property
 @param _onlyGov whether onlyGov should be enforced
@notice Set the address of the periphery/router contract (Pancakeswap/Apeswap/etc.)

@notice Set the burn address (for removing tokens out of existence)
 @param _burnAddress the burn address

@notice set the address of the contract to send controller fees to
 @param _rewardsAddress the address of the Rewards contract

params._amount: The amount of the tokens to transfer
params._to: The address to transfer tokens to
params._token: Address of the ERC20 token to transfer

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._rewardsAddress: the address of the Rewards contract

params._entranceFeeFactor: Entrance fee numerator (higher means smaller percentage)
params._withdrawFeeFactor: Withdrawal fee numerator (higher means smaller percentage)

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

convertDustToEarned().notice: Converts dust tokens into earned tokens, which will be reinvested on the next earn()

inCaseTokensGetStuck(address,uint256,add.notice: Safely transfer ERC20 tokens stuck in this contract to a specified address

setBurnAddress(address).notice: Set the burn address (for removing tokens out of existence)

setRewardsAddress(address).notice: set the address of the contract to send controller fees to

setUniRouterAddress(address).notice: Set the address of the periphery/router contract (Pancakeswap/Apeswap/etc.)
